text: @TexasTribune @GovAbbott . @GovAbbott in TX and  @GovRonDeSantis in FL could take the necessary steps to slow the spread of Coronavirus and save lives. They won’t do it. They are unwilling to be the leaders they could be and instead are allowing citizens of their states to die.
